frontmatter.title: Implementing MCMC - Hamiltonian Monte Carlo
frontmatter.author: Tom
frontmatter.excerpt: This post is about Hamiltonian Monte Carlo, an MCMC algorithm that builds on the Metropolis algorithm, but uses information about the geometry of the posterior to make better proposals.

highest quality of the three."),mdx("h2",null,"Summary"),mdx("p",null,"The effective sample size is a good measure of the quality of a sample from a
